record_id: INSTRUCTIONS: keep headers unchanged; one prospect per row; fill company to create a valid record; leave this guide row in place (it is ignored on import).
gap_summary: Short summary of unresolved gaps; use 'No open gaps' when complete
urgent_win: Urgent win label or short phrase
gaps_json: Optional JSON array of gap objects
snapshot_json: Optional JSON object (overrides many profile fields)
viz_json: Optional JSON object for ROI widgets
record_json: Optional full record JSON object (highest precedence)
